mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, p.post_content, (SELECT count(*) FROM post_like AS pl WHERE pl.post_index = p.post_index) AS like_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM comment AS c WHERE c.post_index = p.post_index) AS comment_count FROM posting AS p INNER JOIN user_info AS u ON p.login_id = u.login_id

SELECT u.user_id, p.post_content, (SELECT count(*) FROM post_like AS pl WHERE pl.post_index = #{postIndex}) AS like_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM comment AS c WHERE c.post_index = #{postIndex}) AS comment_count FROM posting AS p INNER JOIN user_info AS u ON p.login_id = u.login_id WHERE p.post_index = ${postIndex}
SELECT p.post_content, bi.saved_file_name, ui.user_id FROM posting p INNER JOIN user_info ui ON p.login_id = ui.login_id INNER JOIN board_img bi ON p.post_index = bi.board_index LIMIT 3 OFFSET 0;
SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, sum(p.product_price) FROM product AS p INNER JOIN user_info AS u ON p.login_id = u.login_id;
